item.title:
Txs for buying trump and his wife simply does not land with most RPCs. Not sure why we share a free swQoS endpoint with hardware sigverify can get so much hate üòÖüòÖ
And sorry, our validator and endpoint landed thousands of trump and melina trades with no priority fee last hour.

item.title:
RT by @shoucccc: as all services are down on Solana...
you can now broadcast to Solayer's hardware optimized endpoint to get your tx through - no tips needed
we are now doubling the compute unit and block size
